title: Cruel Cruel Games
description: My past just is now my present  Three tormenters Noah, Guzman, and Connor all heirs to the California Billion Dollar fortune. I thought I would never see them again After they taunted me back in Junior School Thanks to a scholarship, I arrive at Bartonwoods Elite Prep Academy Ready to take on what might come my way  I couldn't believe it. They own this school They are Royalty Here Everyone falls at their feet Not me Well Revenge is mine to take I will make take them down Oh yes They will fall at my feet and pay for the past Regardless of the stakes  This is a bully/reverse harem high standalone story Recommended for eighteen plus
author: Elly Xander
